title: TSI Infrastructure
description: Technical Specifications for Interoperability - Infrastructure subsystem
content: TSI-INF defines requirements for track gauge, loading gauge, minimum curve radius, maximum gradient, and structural requirements for railway infrastructure in Europe.

title: ETCS Level 2
description: European Train Control System Level 2 implementation requirements
content: ETCS Level 2 requires Radio Block Centre (RBC), GSM-R communication, onboard units with SIL-4 certification, and balises every 1000m minimum. Implementation cost typically 15-25 million NOK per 100km.

title: CENELEC EN 50126
description: Railway applications - The specification and demonstration of RAMS
content: EN 50126 specifies RAMS (Reliability, Availability, Maintainability, Safety) requirements for railway systems. Requires HAZOP analysis, FMEA studies, and independent safety assessor validation.
